emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Code Synthesis
emerging_technologies.description: AI systems capable of autonomously developing complete software applications from high-level descriptions.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces need for human coders, changes educational focus from coding to system architecture and problem solving.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires significant trust in AI capabilities, ethical considerations around AI job displacement.

emerging_technologies.name: Neuromorphic Computing
emerging_technologies.description: Computing systems designed to mimic the biological neural structures of the human brain, leading to more efficient AI processing.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for more intuitive AI-human interactions, ethical concerns about privacy and thought manipulation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Dependent on advances in materials science and computational theory.

emerging_technologies.name: Space-Based Solar Power
emerging_technologies.description: Satellite systems in geostationary orbit that collect solar energy and beam it back to Earth as microwave or laser energy.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces reliance on fossil fuels, potential geopolitical issues regarding energy control.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost of launch, efficiency of energy transmission, international space law.

emerging_technologies.name: Blockchain-Based Digital Identity
emerging_technologies.description: A secure, decentralized system for managing personal digital identities, enhancing privacy and security.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves online security, potential for misuse in anonymity crimes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory acceptance, integration with existing systems, public trust in blockchain.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Pair Programming
mainstream_technologies.description: AI systems that assist developers in real-time, suggesting code, debugging, and even writing parts of the software.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in software development teams, enhancing productivity and reducing errors.

mainstream_technologies.name: Autonomous Public Transport
mainstream_technologies.description: Fully autonomous buses and trains operating in urban environments, reducing human error in transit.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Cities worldwide are implementing these systems, with public acceptance growing as safety is proven.

epoch_themes.description: AI's role in reshaping industries, from software development to healthcare.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Job displacement in coding, new job opportunities in AI ethics and oversight, shift in educational paradigms.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global push for AI regulation, ethical AI frameworks, and AI education initiatives.

epoch_themes.description: Focus on technologies that support environmental sustainability and resource efficiency.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Reduces carbon footprint, changes in energy policy and geopolitical dynamics.
epoch_themes.global_trends: International cooperation in space technology, increased investment in green technologies.

epoch_themes.description: The rise of technologies aimed at enhancing digital privacy and security.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Enhanced personal data control, potential for digital divide between those who can and cannot afford advanced security.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on cybersecurity laws, privacy rights, and digital infrastructure resilience.
